title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: For a moment you feel cut off from the world you know.  All you can hear is the shrieking wind, sounding like an angry soul bemoaning its fate, and all you can see is blowing white snow.  With an effort you shake the feeling, although you cannot seem to warm the cold in your soul.

For a moment you feel cut off from the world you know.  All you can hear is the shrieking wind, sounding like an angry soul bemoaning its fate, and all you can see is blowing snow and shadow.  With an effort you shake the feeling, although you cannot seem to warm the cold in your soul.
paths: Obvious paths: east, southeast, southwest, northwest
